page.title: 15FARMING IN LYNEHAM
page.content: WE WENT OVER THE FIELD TO THE BENNETT FARM. WHEN WE GOT TO THE GATE MRS BENNETT WAS THERE. THE FIRST THING WE SAW WAS THE CALVES IN A STABLE AND THEY DRANK MILK AND CALF CAKE. THE CALVES WERE BROWN AND WHITE. WE SAW HOW THE COWS WERE MILKED AND WE SAW SOME MILK IN BIG CONTAINERS. THE HORSES WERE IN THE YARD. ONE WAS CALLED ROULETTE AND ONE WAS CHEWING THE GATE. WE SAW A NEW GRASSMOWER AND WE SAW A NEW TRACTOR. WE WENT IN THE STRAW AND THEN WE PLAYED IN IT. CHRISTIAN GOT STUCK AND KEVIN GOT CHRISTIAN OUT AND I ROLLED IN IT. GEORGINA MILLER 6YRS
